operation.Operation.cs_reg_resi¶

classmethod Operation.cs_reg_resi(xmatrix: ndarray[Any, dtype[Any]], ymatrix: ndarray[Any, dtype[Any]]) → ndarray[Any, dtype[Any]]¶

Calculate the residual of cross section regression(including intercept).

Parameters:

  • xmatrix (array_like) -- The input matrix x.

  • ymatrix (array_like) -- The input matrix y.

Returns:

The resulting numpy array with the residual values applied

Return type:

ndarray

Alpha
